The platform development team [[eclipseplatform_contributions2"> === Who is involved?
Despite the general assumption that the Eclipse SDK components are developed by an army of developers, the actual core developer team is relatively small.
General information about an Eclipse project can be found under http://projects.eclipse.org/">http://projects.eclipse.org/ . For example via the _Who's Involved_ link you can see an overview of the project activities. For example, the information for the platform project can be found under the https://projects.eclipse.org/projects/eclipse/who">Eclipse project link.
